original: Bodhiyā niruddhāya vigatāya paṭipassaddhāya abuddho hotīti?
analyzed: bodhiyā niruddhāya vigatāya paṭipassaddhāya abuddhaḥ hoti iti
tāya bodhiyā bodhi karaṇīyam karoti iti
tāya bodhiyā bodhi karaṇīyam karoti iti

original: Tāya bodhiyā dukkhaṁ parijānāti, samudayaṁ pajahati, nirodhaṁ sacchikaroti, maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
analyzed: tāya bodhiyā dukkham parijānāti samudayam pajahati nirodham sacchikaroti maggam bhāveti iti
tāya bodhiyā bodhi karaṇīyam karoti iti
tāya bodhiyā bodhi karaṇīyam karoti iti

analyzed: tāya bodhiyā dukkham parijānāti pe maggam bhāveti iti

original: Paccuppannāya bodhiyā buddho, tāya bodhiyā bodhikaraṇīyaṁ karotīti?
analyzed: paccuppannāya bodhiyā buddhaḥ tāya bodhiyā bodhi karaṇīyam karoti iti
